channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple Needs Time to Be on Its Side for AI iPhones
item.description: Wall Street is seeing moderate iPhone sales gains over the next two years, as AI features will roll out slowly.

item.title: Wells Fargo sees opportunity for Crescent Energy stock with expanded Eagle Ford position
Flooding Is Getting Worse---and Fewer Homeowners Have Insurance
item.description: Swaths of the U.S. that have never flooded before are now in danger of being swamped, but the risk isn’t covered by standard home-insurance policies.

item.title: Huize's International Arm Poni Insurtech Completes Acquisition of Controlling Stake in Global Care, a Leading Insurtech Platform in Vietnam
Affirm to Profit Soon From Buy Now, Pay Later
item.description: Lower interest rates and growing volume will be tailwinds.

item.title: PRIMO WATER AND BLUETRITON BRANDS ANNOUNCE EXPIRATION OF THE WAITING PERIOD UNDER THE HSR ACT
Bank of America Bets on Carbon Capture With Big Tax-Credit Deal
item.description: A first-of-its-kind investment gives an ethanol producer in North Dakota $205 million for stashing emissions underground.

item.title: Lotus Technology wins 2024 EUCCC Sustainable Business Award for Decarbonization Leadershi
The Crushing Financial Burden of Aging at Home
item.description: Families face soaring costs and mounting pressures in taking care of their loved ones. “I never feel truly free.”

item.title: Babcock & Wilcox Awarded Front-End Engineering and Design Contract for Canada's First Waste-to-Energy Plant with Carbon Capture and Sequestration
